response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,400,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a significant saving while gaining access to a valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
